name: part_004
file: tmp_【#アキロゼ4周年LIVE】全編歌ライブ！みんなと歌って踊って3D LIVE 「ROSE of the LAMP」【アキ・ローゼンタール⧸ホロライブ】 [mknggf96fuI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Continuation and conclusion of the song 'Phony' performance with Aki Rosenthal and Nekomata Okayu.
Visual transition with sparkles and logos.
Performance of the song 'Shikisai no Blues' by Aki Rosenthal in a rainy city street setting.

subtitles.original: いつもだけ
subtitles.english: Only as always,

subtitles.original: それすら夜の手に解されて
subtitles.english: Even that is unraveled by the hands of the night

subtitles.original: 愛の罠に
subtitles.english: Into the trap of love.

subtitles.original: さよなら　またねとつぶやいた
subtitles.english: Whispering "Goodbye, see you again",

subtitles.original: フォニイ　フォニイ　フォニイ
subtitles.english: Phony, phony, phony.

subtitles.original: 嘘に絡まってる
subtitles.english: Entangled in lies,

subtitles.original: あたしはフォニイ
subtitles.english: I am phony.

subtitles.original: 造花だけが知ってる　秘密のフォニイ
subtitles.english: Only artificial flowers know the secret phony.

subtitles.original: 色彩のブルース / 作詞：中納良恵 / 作曲：中納良恵/森雅樹
subtitles.english: Shikisai no Blues / Lyrics: Yoshie Nakano / Composition: Yoshie Nakano, Masaki Mori

subtitles.original: 昨日の夢　オレンジ色の影に
subtitles.english: Yesterday's dream, in the orange-colored shadows,

subtitles.original: 今日の夢　沈黙の気配しめす
subtitles.english: Today's dream shows a hint of silence.

subtitles.original: アルコールの川をゆっくり渡る
subtitles.english: Slowly crossing the river of alcohol,

subtitles.original: 長靴のリズム　心で酔いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's get drunk with our hearts to the rhythm of boots.

subtitles.original: 鉛の指から流れるメロディー
subtitles.english: The melody flowing from leaden fingers,

subtitles.original: 激しく染める　光の渦
subtitles.english: A vortex of light, dyeing it all intensely,

subtitles.original: 灯りの色が奏でるブルース
subtitles.english: The blues played by the colors of light,

subtitles.original: やさしく泣いてる吐息に甘えさせて
subtitles.english: Let me indulge in the gently crying sighs.

subtitles.original: 期待のカップ　裏通りの風景が
subtitles.english: A cup of anticipation, back alley scenery,

subtitles.original: ひしめき合う　しゃがれた声の香水
subtitles.english: Crowding together, the perfume of raspy voices.

subtitles.original: モノクロームの中に封じ込めた姿を
subtitles.english: The figure sealed within monochrome,

subtitles.original: 遠い約束　リズムで交わしましょう
subtitles.english: Let's exchange distant promises with the rhythm.

subtitles.original: 吐き出す言葉に熱いメロディー
subtitles.english: A hot melody in the words spat out,

subtitles.original: せつなく蘇るデジャブの香り
subtitles.english: The painfully recurring scent of déjà vu,

subtitles.original: 心を溶かす色彩のブルース
subtitles.english: The Shikisai no Blues that melts the heart,

subtitles.original: 甘くささやいた吐息が眠るまで
subtitles.english: Until the sweetly whispered sighs fall asleep.

subtitles.original: 鉛の指から流れるメロディー
subtitles.english: The melody flowing from leaden fingers,

subtitles.original: 激しく染める　光の渦
subtitles.english: A vortex of light, dyeing it all intensely,

subtitles.original: 灯りの色が奏でるブルース
subtitles.english: The blues played by the colors of light,

subtitles.original: やさしく泣いてる吐息に甘えさせて
subtitles.english: Let me indulge in the gently crying sighs.

subtitles.original: 吐き出す言葉に熱いメロディー
subtitles.english: A hot melody in the words spat out,

subtitles.original: せつなく蘇るデジャブの香り
subtitles.english: The painfully recurring scent of déjà vu,

subtitles.original: 心を溶かす色彩のブルース
subtitles.english: The Shikisai no Blues that melts the heart,
